scripts.build:css: mkdir -p public/css && mkdir -p public/css && pleeease compile node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css app/css/* to public/css/app.css
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'http-server ./public' -s
scripts.watch: npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:assets & npm run watch:css
scripts.watch:scripts: mkdir -p public/js && watchify -d app/js/app.js -o public/js/app.js -t babelify -t riotify -v true
